name: Game of Words: Cross & Connect
description:
Choose your House, prepare your brain, and enter the Game of Words!

Game of Words combines word finding and crossword fun for an amazing puzzle experience. Choose which House to fight for, then solve puzzles and build your Kingdom. It’s simple to learn and easy to get started, but you’ll soon find yourself challenged by real brain teasers!

How to Play

- Swipe your finger over letters to create and connect words
- Words connect to help reveal missing words
- Are all words found and all words connected? If so, you’ve won!
- Complete levels to earn glittering rewards
- Improve your lands and expand your kingdom.

Bonus words

The English languages is fantastically rich. Those with sharp vocabularies will be able to construct multiple words from a handful of letters and be rewarded for doing so. Find a bonus word - collect extra gold!

Combination powerups

Finding multiple valid words in a row will super-charge your matches. Collect letters correctly without going astray to gain a rush of coins to the coffers!

Chests

Completing 3 levels will give you chest rewards containing varying riches. You may uncover a simple wooden chest, or a gleaming golden one. As you progress the odds of getting greater, more valuable chests increases. Rumor has it, magical, legendary, and divine chests with untold riches await…

Hints

Although hints may be shunned by those confident in their linguistic prowess, when really put to the test, a hint or two can make life easier. Gold from chest rewards can be spent to reveal random letters within puzzles to help bring solutions into better focus.

New Kingdoms

Riches earned by battling through word connect matches will allow you to make upgrades to your land. A completely upgraded land unlocks a special reward from your House! Your journey will see you move from humble beginnings to the sandy lands of Lothrak, to snow covered castles, mystic fortresses, and beyond.

Features

- Over 2900 levels progressing up to 8 letter words!
- Rich and warm lands to enhance
- Addictive, optionally ad-free word puzzle fun!
- Word sets ranging from basic to advanced
- Vocabulary testing word connections to boggle the mind
- Free and addictive word challenges!

Game of Words is free to play, and great for developing brain and vocabulary skills. Collect letters, connect words, and start playing the best new crossword brain teaser now!
